Package com.example.demo.services

Class PatronService

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.services.PatronService
@Service public class PatronService extends Object
Service class for managing patron operations.

    • getAllPatrons

      @Cacheable("patrons") public List<Patron> getAllPatrons()
      Retrieves all patrons.
      Returns:
      List of all patrons.

    • getPatronById

      @Cacheable(value="patrons", key="#id") public Patron getPatronById(Long id)
      Retrieves a patron by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the patron to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The patron with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the patron is not found.

    • addPatron

      @CacheEvict(value="patrons", allEntries=true) public Patron addPatron(Patron patron)
      Adds a new patron.
      Parameters:
      patron - The patron to add.
      Returns:
      The added patron.

    • updatePatron

      @CacheEvict(value="patrons", key="#id") public Patron updatePatron(Long id, Patron patronDetails)
      Updates an existing patron.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the patron to update.
      patronDetails - The updated details of the patron.
      Returns:
      The updated patron.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the patron is not found.

    • deletePatron

      @CacheEvict(value="patrons", key="#id") public void deletePatron(Long id)
      Deletes a patron by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the patron to delete.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the patron is not found.
